title: user registration with valid data
description: Test the /api/auth/register endpoint to ensure a new user can register successfully with valid email, password, firstName, lastName, and optional phone and role fields. Verify the response includes a success message, JWT token, and user details.

title: user login with correct credentials
description: Test the /api/auth/login endpoint to verify that a user can log in successfully using valid email and password. Confirm the response returns a success message, JWT token, and user information.

title: search charging stations with filters
description: Test the /api/stations GET endpoint with various query parameters such as city, stationType, connectorType, minSpeed, maxPrice, lat, lng, radius, page, and limit. Verify that the response returns a filtered list of charging stations with pagination details.

title: get charging station details by id
description: Test the /api/stations/{id} GET endpoint to retrieve detailed information of a specific charging station by its ID. Verify the response contains the correct station details.

title: create new booking with valid data
description: Test the /api/bookings POST endpoint to create a new charging slot booking with valid stationId, chargerId, startTime, endTime, and optional vehicleType and notes. Ensure the booking is created successfully and the response returns the booking details.

title: get user bookings list
description: Test the /api/bookings GET endpoint to retrieve the list of bookings for the authenticated user. Verify the response returns an array of booking objects.

title: get available rental units
description: Test the /api/rentals GET endpoint to fetch the list of available rental charging units. Verify the response returns an array of rental unit objects.

title: create rental request with valid data
description: Test the /api/rentals POST endpoint to create a rental request with valid rentalUnitId, startDate, endDate, deliveryAddress, and optional notes. Confirm the rental request is created successfully and the response returns the rental details.

title: create review for charging station
description: Test the /api/reviews POST endpoint to submit a review for a charging station with required stationId and rating, and optional comment and title. Verify the review is created successfully and the response returns the review details.

title: get reviews for charging station
description: Test the /api/reviews GET endpoint with stationId query parameter to retrieve all reviews for a specific charging station. Verify the response returns an array of review objects.
